channel.title: Pypi on sudo rem
channel.description: Recent content in Pypi on sudo rem

item.title: Tracking Peristent PyPI Malware
item.description: The Python Packaging Ecosystem remains fairly stable in the broad scope of open source package distribution, but they are not immune to sustained attacks either. One threat actor group has evolved from simple nuissance to a sustained stream of spam and malware utilizing GitHub staging and direct targeting of userbases for the distribution of malicious programs.

item.title: PyPI Security
item.description: To those that may or may not know, Vipyr Security was recently invited to discuss what a malicious package reporting API might look like with the Python Software Foundation and Python Packaging oversight entities.
